definition: foregone conclusion/to be settled conclusively
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: But will its leaders succeed in stabilizing the situation in the near term?
sentences.chinese: 但是，其領導着能夠在短期內成功穩定局勢嗎？

sentences.english: LanZhu heart know something is a foregone conclusion, then advised brother do not regenerate.
sentences.chinese: 海蘭珠心知事情已成定局，遂勸告弟弟不要再生事。

sentences.english: The season’s real damage may be done already.
sentences.chinese: 這一季的實際損失已成定局。

sentences.english: In the second half Robert Green played very well, but the mistake remains a mistake.
sentences.chinese: 下半場格林表現很好，但失誤已成定局。

sentences.english: Of course if you and Regina invite her the thing is settled.
sentences.chinese: 當然，如果你和裏吉納請了她，事情就成定局了。

sentences.english: The election result is not a foregone conclusion.
sentences.chinese: 選舉的結果還並非是定局。

sentences.english: The complete collapse of the Kuomintang troops in the Northeast then became a foregone conclusion .
sentences.chinese: 此時，東北國民黨軍全軍覆滅的命運，已成定局。

sentences.english: The matter isn't settled yet. We can take it up again tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 事情還沒有定局，明天可以再議。

definition: that clinches it/that's final/no two ways about it
"Red Poppies", novel by 阿來|阿来[A1 lai2]
lit. the dust has settled (idiom)/fig. to get sorted out/to be finalized
lit. froth and shadows/fig. illusion/mirage
near at hand/imminent/within sight
hopeless situation/deadlock
to be already so/already
pressing in on one's eyelashes (idiom); imminent
without hope/hopeless/without prospects
to be a cinch/in the bag/(of a person) confident of success
lit. target of a multitude of arrows (idiom); the butt of public criticism/attacked on all sides
general trend/irresistible trend
logical/only to be expected/rational and clearly structured (of text)
circumstances require action (idiom); absolutely necessary/imperative
to come to a decision/to fix on (a date etc)/to determine/to finalize/to nail down (a deal etc)
lost game/losing battle
variable (math.)
